analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/36/0xb426d168489b87326a0de11ed29b7391750e8ebd.sol:
	Contract FantomToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/36/0xb426d168489b87326a0de11ed29b7391750e8ebd.sol#206-207)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/36/0xb426d168489b87326a0de11ed29b7391750e8ebd.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/36/0xb426d168489b87326a0de11ed29b7391750e8ebd.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/36/0xb426d168489b87326a0de11ed29b7391750e8ebd.sol#76-77) is not in mixedCase
